TopicTitle: nothing works to recover my saves

Articles.Content:
I am new to the community and English is not my strong point, my apologies if I do not explain myself well.
well it happens that I was playing calmly, I was doing some tests on the interiors of the new unlocked cabins and I had reverted to the VAB, everything was normal, but when I was in the VAB I realized that I had all the pieces unlocked, but I couldn't use Not one, not even the ones that I had unlocked, I couldn't do anything, just see the description of the pieces and not exit the VAB
Then I got an error and the game closed.
After that and opening the game I couldn't access my save (120 hours), I tried to do solutions that I saw on the forum, but it doesn't work, replace "quicksave.sfs / quicksave.loaddata" with "persistent.sfs/persistent. loadmeta" and so on with other copies that I had there, but no one will let me load the game, I don't understand the reason, I would like to have help
I have the "ksp.log" but I don't know how to transfer it to the forum
I don't know if anyone knows how to repair these files, but I don't know if these files can be passed through a link
